gobblin.runtime.scheduler

Class JobSpecSchedulerListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.runtime.scheduler.JobSpecSchedulerListeners
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobSpecSchedulerListener, JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class JobSpecSchedulerListeners
extends Object
implements JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer, JobSpecSchedulerListener, Closeable
    Manages a list of JobSpecSchedulerListeners and can dispatch callbacks to them.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gobblin.runtime.api.JobSpecSchedulerListener

      • registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener

        public void registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer
        Like JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer.registerJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener) but it will create a weak reference. The implementation will automatically remove the listener registration once the listener object gets GCed.

        Note that weak listeners cannot be removed used JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer.unregisterJobSpecSchedulerListener(JobSpecSchedulerListener).

        Specified by:
        registerWeakJobSpecSchedulerListener in interface JobSpecSchedulerListenersContainer
